â€” English Description â€”

This is a dark and emotional METAL-style AI cover
of the classic Japanese song Kagami no Dress.

Original Song: Kagami no Dress
Artist: Noriko Sakai
Year: 1996

Known as the theme song of the Japanese TV drama
Zoku: Hoshi no Kinka,
this track reflects inner conflict, vulnerability,
and emotional depth.

By blending its introspective, delicate melody
with the raw power and intensity of heavy metal,
this cover delivers a dramatic and expressive reinterpretation
using modern AI arrangement techniques.

A melancholic metal ballad
filled with tension, sorrow, and quiet strength.

If you enjoy metal covers, AI music,
or reimagined Japanese classics,
please subscribe to the channel.
